summary: a dark grey colorscheme based on zenesque
name: zazen
description:
A very minimal dark/grey color scheme based on zenesque (vimscript#3340). Zazen only includes the dark version with slightly modified shades and minimal coloring. Shades and colors were adjusted to give priority to elements that might be regarded as more more important (although that might be different for different people).

As zenesque, this is a GUI-only theme.

Screenshot: http://img5.imageshack.us/i/zazen.png/
install_details: Copy zazen.vim to your colors directory and switch to it with :colorscheme zazen (or select zazen from the Edit->Colorscheme menu) or in your vimrc.

versions.release_notes: Colored diff and slight tone changes.
